org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front
Class OAuth2Filter

java.lang.Object
  org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front.OAuth2Filter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class OAuth2Filter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

OAuth 2 Servlet filter to protect resources on a Resource server.

  • Extract the access token from the request
  • Gets the corresponding information with the Authorization server
  • Validate life time and scope
  • Process if possible the request.

Constant Field Values

resource

protected java.lang.String resource
Resource protected and served by this server. Value read in servlet configuration: init-parameter "securedResourceName".

service

protected ValidationService service
The validation service. The implementation class for this class is specified in servlet configuration: init-parameter "validationServiceClass". This class must implements the ValidationService interface and have a default constructor.

Sets the WWW-Authenticate response header to explain the reject of an incoming request.

Parameters:
response - The HTTP Response, enriched with header.
error - The error case.
description - The error description.
errorStatus - The HTTP response code.
